sentences.en: At Billy's Cafe, the menu is limited and the food is lousy.
sentences.cn: 比利咖啡馆的菜品选择有限，食物也很差。

sentences.en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentences.cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

sentences.en: Film is a business with limited opportunities for actresses.
sentences.cn: 电影行业对女演员来说机会有限。

sentences.en: Haig was limited by his blinkered approach to strategy and tactics.
sentences.cn: 海格被自己那一套保守的战略战术所束缚。

sentences.en: He is the founder of International Sports Management Limited.
sentences.cn: 他是国际体育管理有限公司的创始人。

sentences.en: I'm a limited and obtuse clergyman while you're the expert.
sentences.cn: 你是专家，而我是个能力有限的愚笨牧师。

sentences.en: My knowledge of the business is limited.
My limited diplomatic skills were tested to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 我有限的外交手腕儿受到了极其严峻的考验。

sentences.en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.cn: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。

sentences.en: Our capacity for giving care, love and attention is limited.
sentences.cn: 我们能够给予的关怀、关爱和关注是有限的。

sentences.en: So far, the education reforms have had only limited success.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，教育改革只取得了有限的成效。

sentences.en: The denial was limited to rejecting the construction put on his remarks.
sentences.cn: 这种否认仅限于不接受对他所说话语的阐释。

sentences.en: The organization has very limited resources.
sentences.cn: 这家机构资源非常有限。

sentences.en: These zip-top bags are great space-savers if storage is limited.
sentences.cn: 如果可储藏的地方有限，这些拉环式背包能节省很大空间。

sentences.en: They are reliant on a very limited number of exportable products.
sentences.cn: 他们依赖数量非常有限的外销产品。

sentences.en: This course is limited to 12 people and costs £50.
sentences.cn: 该课程只招收12人，学费为50英镑。

sentences.en: Variation among humans is limited to the possible permutations of our genes.
sentences.cn: 人类的变异受限于我们的基因可能存在哪些排列。

sentences.en: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.
sentences.cn: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。

words.tran_cn: 限制；限度；极限；追诉时效；有效期限
[机][电] 限制器，[电子] 限幅器；限制者

phrases.tran_cn: n. 有限容量；有限能力
有限公司；（英）股份有限公司（等于limited-liability company）
发行额有限的限定版（通常为装订精美者）
有限责任；有限债务责任
n. 有限责任股东；有限责任合伙人
有限责任合伙公司；普通合股公司
有限质量保证；有限保固

trans.tran_en: not very great in amount, number, ability etc
